code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{createClient}from'@supabase/supabase-js';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const supabase=createClient(process.env.REACT_APP_SUPABASE_URL,process.env.REACT_APP_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY);const MagicLinkLogin=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const handleMagicLink=async e=>{e.preventDefault();const{error}=await supabase.auth.signInWithOtp({email,options:{emailRedirectTo:'http://localhost:3000/login'}});if(error){setMessage('‚ùå Errore: '+error.message);}else{setMessage('üì© Controlla la tua email per il magic link!');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{maxWidth:'400px',margin:'2rem auto'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Login con Magic Link"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleMagicLink,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Inserisci la tua email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true,style:{width:'100%',marginBottom:'1rem',padding:'0.5rem'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"\uD83D\uDCEC Invia Magic Link"})]}),message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{marginTop:'1rem'},children:message})]});};export default MagicLinkLogin;
